column2: "Na ɔkyerɛɛ me nkwa nsu esutsen krɔnkrɔn a n’enyi tsew dɛ ahwehwɛ a ofi Nyankopɔn nye Eguambaa no n’ahengua no mu
"ɔwɔ n’abɔntsen finimfin. Na esutsen n’afa ha na ha na nkwadua no wɔ a ɔsow eduaba horow duebien
column3: na ɔsow aba bosoom nyina: na dua no n’ahaban wɔdze sa amanaman yarba."

column2: "Na ndom biara nnyi hɔ bio: na Nyankopɔn nye Eguambaa no hɔn ahengua besi mu: na no nkowaa bɔsom no:"
"na wobohu n’enyim; na ne dzin wɔ hɔn momapɔw do."
"Na adzesaa nnyi hɔ bio: na wonnkehia kandzea anaa ewia ne kan; osiandɛ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn bɛhyerɛn hɔn do; na wobedzi hen mbersantsen mfesantsen."
"Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Nsɛm yi yɛ ampa nye nokwar: na Ewuradze
column5: asoma no bɔfoe dɛ ɔmbɛkyerɛ n’akowaa dza otwar dɛ ɔba mu ntsɛm."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: mereba ntsɛm: nhyira nye nyia osie nwoma yi mu nkɔnhyɛnsɛm no."

column2: "Na emi John nye nyia ɔtsee na ohun ndzɛmba yi. Na metsee na muhunii no
column3: mohwee ase dɛ morokotow ɔbɔfo a ɔkyerɛɛ me ndzɛmba yi n’anan ase."

column2: "Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Mma nnyɛ dɛm: na meyɛ w’ewurakowaa nye wo nuanom nkɔnhyɛfo
column4: nye hɔn a wosie nwoma yi mu nsɛm no dze: kotow sɔr Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Mma nnsɔw nwoma yi mu nkɔnhyɛnsɛm no ano: na ber no edu."

column2: "Nyia ɔnntsen no
column3: ɔnkɔ do araa nyɛ dza ɔnntsen: na nyia ɔyɛ fifi
column4: ɔnda ho araa nyɛ fifi: na nyia ɔtsen no
column5: ɔnkɔ do nyɛ dza ɔtsen: na nyia ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: mereba ntsɛm: medze m’akatua dɛ medze rebɛma obiara dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse."

column2: "Nhyira nye hɔn a wɔhor hɔn ntar
column3: ama woeenya nkwadua no ho kwan
column4: na wɔaahɛn mbobow no mu akɔ kurow no mu."

column2: "Na n’ekyir na nkraman
column7: nye obiara a ɔpɛ na odzi ator no wɔ."

column2: "Emi
column4: na masoma mo bɔfoe dɛ ombedzi ndzɛmba yi ho dase nkyerɛ hom mma asɔr horow no. Emi na meyɛ David ndwow nye aba

column2: "Na Sunsum nye ayefor no se
column3: Bra. Na ma nyia ɔtse iyi no nse dɛ
column4: Bra. Na ma nyia nsukɔm dze no no mbra: Obiara a ɔpɛ no
column5: ɔmbra mbɛfa nkwa nsu no kwa."

column2: "Mobɔ obiara a ɔtse nwoma yi mu nkɔnhyɛnsɛm no kɔkɔ dɛ
column3: Sɛ obiara dze bi ka ho a
column4: Nyankopɔn dze mbusuhaw a wɔakyerɛw no nwoma yi mu no bi bɛka no ho:"

column2: "na sɛ obiara yi nwoma yi mu nkɔnhyɛnsɛm no bi a
column3: Nyankopɔn beyi ne kyɛfa efi nkwadua
column4: nye kurow krɔnkrɔn a wɔakyerɛw no nwoma yi mu no mu."

column2: "Nyia odzi ndzɛmba yi ho dase no se
column3: Ampaara: mereba ntsɛm. Amen. Ewuradze Jesus

column2: "Ewuradze Jesus adom no nye hom nyina ntsena. [Amen.]"
